posts.author: MiniQuinny
posts.content:
Hello there guys,

I am looking for a build with a Good AB and Shocking DMG for a High Magic Sever where Sneak Attacks are rendered just about useless..

I am hopeless at building, but I was looking for something around the Paladin / Fighter / WM area and a Greatsword.
The server I am currently playing doesn't have many restrictions and is very flexible with Character Alignments and stuff.

posts.author: MiniQuinny
posts.content: Also, on the server that I play Dev Crit rather than Insta Kill applies double the DMG. So Dev Crit would be excellent if it could be fitted in there.

posts.author: Maximillian Kane
posts.content:
Well, that would depend on how much you're willing to relinquish defense. The more offensive you are, the more damage you'll do, and the less defense you'll have. When you think of damage, it screams STR-based Ranger with BoE. As far as damage goes, this is possibly the best damage output in NWN.

There is a build by Grimnir77 that is all about that. Here is a link to it:

The Grim Ripper

That guy has INSANE damage output, so much so that Devcrit is actually kind of unnecessary. Is this the kind of build you were looking for?

EDIT: Also on that build there's a link for another similar build with DevCrit at the bottom of the OP.

Take it EZ!

posts.author: Maximillian Kane
posts.content:
Another possibility is a dual-wielding Str-based Ranger. This one, for example, is a MONSTER in damage-dealing.

You can swap some FEs and rework some of the feats depending on the enemies you're planning to fight. Most of the tough enemy types are there, so you shouldn't have much trouble. Here it is:

DEX: 14
CON: 10
WIS: 14
INT: 14

posts.author: Maximillian Kane
posts.content:
Yet another possibility is TyrTemplar's Dragonborn Ranger, which is a versatile meleer in that it uses two weapon types, and has a devcrit variant included in the build. Here is the link:

Dragonborn Ranger

Or, a final alternative of published builds, my Holy Weapon Master with Cheese build. It uses the synergies of Paladin damage buffs with WM critical Hit enhancements. Here's the link:

The Holy Weapon Master with Cheese

Ok, I think I have given you enough to think about, but there's still one more build which is a monster at damage-dealing:

Take it EZ!

posts.author: HipMaestro
posts.content:
MiniQuinny wrote:
I am looking for a build with a Good AB and Shocking DMG for a High Magic Sever where Sneak Attacks are rendered just about useless..
--clip--
My first question would be: Does the Immunity: Critical Hit property appear on any items and are there many unnerfed Pale Master builds there? High magic servers tend to have some crazy item properties floating around.

posts.author: MiniQuinny
posts.content: Their are no Crit Immunity items that I am aware of, but their are a few PM's running around.

posts.author: HipMaestro
posts.content:
MiniQuinny wrote:Their are no Crit Immunity items that I am aware of, but their are a few PM's running around.
Then... if critting is not a concern, the Grimnir's scythemaster that Max linked should do the trick. Almost any decent scyther is a serious threat but FEs make it even that more overwhelming. Just like Max explained... so much damage that the threat roll for DevCrit becomes a non-issue.
